plot: A young couple who are having marital problems attend a $100 per day special sex school in order to salvage their marriage before it's too late.
title: School of Love
plot_es: A young couple who are having marital problems attend a $100 per day special sex school in order to salvage their marriage before it's too late.
plot_en: A young couple who are having marital problems attend a $100 per day special sex school in order to salvage their marriage before it's too late.
